post.title: internet problem not a phone issue (error: requested content homepage cannot..)
post.content: i activated a ax260 rumor for a friend and the internet wont work i get this error error: requested content homepage/' cannot be accessed its not a phone issue because when i move my number to the phone the internet works, when i called page plus (im a dealer) they said it must be a number issue since my number the web works but the other number the web doesnt work. anyone seen this error and know how to fix it?
